message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $9,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $7,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $9,000 is a bit steep for you, and $7,500 is a bit low for me. Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $8,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm happy to pay $8,000.  That's my absolute maximum, and I'd be really disappointed if we couldn't reach an agreement.

I understand that $8,000 is your maximum budget, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I've invested a lot in this product and I'm not willing to go below my minimum of $8,500. I'm willing to make one more concession: I'll sell it to you for $8,250. This is as low as I can go.
